mainSequence.step: Depositor accesses the DOI Information Page
Web Interface receives the request to access DOI Info
Backend Server queries the DOI Assignment Process in the DOI Information Database
DOI Information Database returns the DOI Process Info to Backend Server
Backend Server requests required Metadata Fields from Metadata Service
Metadata Service returns the required Metadata Fields to Backend Server
Backend Server responds with DOI and Metadata Info to Web Interface
Web Interface displays the DOI and Metadata Information to Depositor
